Perceptor:

Perceptor set the shields and defences up and replied to Hydras 
while he draged Nightlight towards the cells "Do you rather that the 
prisioner be first, MAster??? She could know what happened with our 
first scout-team that introduced to the Maximal Base... Plus you can 
see the show, 'cause I have special gadget that don't let her 
scape..."



--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, aerosmith4e@a... wrote:
> Hydras sent a message back in encoded comm, "Get her in a cell and 
put the 
> shield's up now! We will have the maximals barring down the gates 
to get to 
> that bot...I suggest you reprogram her...to the core of her spark!"
> > pERCEPTOR:
> > 
> > Perceptor sent a encodedcom link to Hydras "Master Hydras, the 
> > hostage is inside our base, she's awakening, I wonder if you 
desire 
> > told to her husband that she's our... Guest?? " he said ll those

> >

a

some

enough 
> > for Rodimus to 
> > > > > send a thrust kick his way.

straight in

scheme

things

with
